definition: to send out/to show (one's feeling)/to issue/to develop/to make a bundle of money/classifier for gunshots (rounds)

sentences.english: Xiao Ming looks listless when he is sick.
She turned the wick down, lifted off the globe, and breathed onthe sulky flame.
sentences.chinese: 她把燈芯捻低，取下燈罩，對着發蔫的火頭哈了口氣。
